info.name: Integration Testing (External requests)
info.description: Keep in mind that for simplicity (and clarity) tests here are not in order and will not work if you follow the order of the sequence. Most of them can be performed by loggin with the Admin Role of Speedwagon, as mentioned in the descriptions of some of the request.
